data.title: WikiTree FREE Family Tree
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Thomas Lane born 1765 Bedford, Colony of Virginia died 1828 Tracy, Barren, Kentucky, USA including ancestors + children + Y-chromosome DNA + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Ancestors

[spouse(s) unknown]

Problems/Questions

Profile last modified 7 Aug 2024 | Created 14 Jul 2022

This page has been accessed 119 times.

Biography

This profile is part of the Tracy, Kentucky One Place Study One Place Study.

1765 Estimated birth in Bedford Virginia, USA. [1]

1787 Thomas Lane taxed in Campbell County, exact location unknown. Campbell County, Virginia, USA.

1789 Thomas moves with Daniel and Moses to Pittsylvania - where they are all taxed. Pittsylvania County, Virginia, USA.

1790 Thomas taxed in Pittsylvania from 1789-1800 always in the southern section of the county. He was perhaps on the Sandy River. Pittsylvania County, Virginia, USA.

13 Mar 1790 Marriage Thomas marries Elizabeth Wilkinson, given by herself. Ceremony by Nathan Brown, most likely a Baptist Minister. Pittsylvania, Virginia, USA. [2] [3]

20 Jul 1796 Thomas' sister-in-law Sallie Wilkinson marries Joseph Gosnell. Joseph was brother to Rachel Gosnell who married Daniel Lane. Pittsylvania County, Virginia, USA.

1800 Thomas and Moses Lane taxed in Henry County VA. This is a sign they are both about to migrate to KY. Henry County, Virginia, USA.

1805 Thomas Lane taxed on 200a on Dry Creek. Which is just northwest of Tracy. Tracy, Barren, Kentucky, USA.

1810 Thomas Lane listed in census of Barren County next to his brother-in-law Joseph Gosnell: Tho Lane 1-1-1-0-1, 4-2-1-1-1. Also several houses away is Allen and Carter Drake. Barren, Kentucky, United States. [4]

May 1811 Traces Magazine, Volume 21, Number 1, shows a list of early members of the "Mill Creek Baptist Church" (=Mulkey Meeting House). It lists Thomas Lane leaving the church in May 1811. Barren County, Kentucky, USA.

1820 Census is alphabetized. Thomas Lane listed next to his son Moses Lane.Barren, Kentucky, United States. [5] USA [6]

1820 Thomas taxed for 2 sections of land on Dry Creek. Tracy, Barren County, Kentucky, United States of America.

1824 Thomas and sons Moses and Booker taxed in Barren County. Thomas farms 100a on Big Barren River in Monroe County. Barren County, Kentucky, USA.

1826 Thomas Lane taxed for 50a on Dry fork. Next to his son Moses. Barren County, Kentucky, USA.

Oct 1828 Thomas' estate handled by sons Moses and Booker. Thomas buried on his own land, just southeast of Tracy. Tracy, Barren, Kentucky, USA. [1]

Buried Tracy, Barren County, Kentucky, United States of America. [1]

Name: Thomas Lane. Given Name: Thomas. Surname: Lane. [7] [5] [4] [6] [1] [8] [9]
